item.description:
Since best camera is the one you have with you, the iPhone is the perfect complement for photographers. The phone camera itself is pretty good, but the available apps can make anyone a creative whiz. Jeff Wagner will share some of his favorite iPhone photo apps and will illustrate of some of the creative possibilities.

 

FYI:  Main Street Art is located at 75 Main Street, Newfields, NH.  If you are interested in purchasing a brown bag lunch from the Newfields Country Store (just down the street from MSA), call 603-773-5656 by 11:15 a.m. and your lunch will be ready for pick-up on your way to the Art Talk.
item.name: Art Talk at Main Street Art in Newfields: iPhone Photography
